term.title: alternating copolymer

item.text: A copolymer consisting of macromolecules comprising two species of monomeric units in alternating sequence.

notes.item: An alternating copolymer may be considered as a homopolymer derived from an implicit or hypothetical monomer.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2301 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
